title: FCA bans Magnus Michael Peterson from the financial services industry (FCA - Financial Conduct Authority) ...
text: ( Source : FCA - Financial Conduct Authority ) Published: TodayLast Modified : Today The Financial Conduct Authority (FCA) has today banned Magnus Michael Peterson , the former head of the hedge fund Weavering Macro Fixed Income Fund Limited ,
